trans-unit.source: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer
trans-unit.target: Create Advanced Encoding Workflows with Workflow Designer

trans-unit.source: Learn about how to create advanced encoding workflows with Workflow Designer.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how to create advanced encoding workflows with Workflow Designer.

trans-unit.source: The Workflow Designer is a standalone tool that is used to create workflows/graphs for encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow.
trans-unit.target: The Workflow Designer is a standalone tool that is used to create workflows/graphs for encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow.

trans-unit.source: This tool can also be used to modify <linkText>existing workflows</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: This tool can also be used to modify <linkText>existing workflows</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: To get a copy of the Workflow Designer tool, please contact mepd@microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: To get a copy of the Workflow Designer tool, please contact mepd@microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: Once a workflow file is created, it can be uploaded as an Asset, and then be used for encoding media files.
trans-unit.target: Once a workflow file is created, it can be uploaded as an Asset, and then be used for encoding media files.

trans-unit.source: For information on how to encode with Media Encoder Premium Workflow using .NET, see Advanced encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow.
trans-unit.target: For information on how to encode with Media Encoder Premium Workflow using .NET, see Advanced encoding with Media Encoder Premium Workflow.

trans-unit.source: The default workflow files can be modified using the designer tool.
trans-unit.target: The default workflow files can be modified using the designer tool.

trans-unit.source: You can get the default workflow files <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: You can get the default workflow files <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The folder also contains the description of these files.
trans-unit.target: The folder also contains the description of these files.

trans-unit.target: The following videos demonstrate how to use the designer.
